segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising that she hasn't noticed the puddle at her feet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how focused the boy is on getting those cookies, he must really want them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks like it's about to tip over, that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be helping him, waiting for a cookie, she looks excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, it seems like they have.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and calm, it's a beautiful day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen, it's quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes the mess soon, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a slipping hazard if she doesn't clean it up, she needs to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
